About Me Projects

My Expertise

I do practical analysis for businesses. I've worked with fast-paced start-ups, siloed ERP/CRM platforms, gigabytes of irregularly formatted data, time-series predictive analysis, and high-level data architecture and infrastructure design.

You can find out more on my resume.
